roleMapping.fury: Project Director - Coordinates mobile and API development, manages release cycles
roleMapping.ironman: Mobile Architect - App architecture, state management, offline sync, navigation patterns
roleMapping.spiderman: Mobile UI Developer - Native UI components, animations, gestures, accessibility, responsive layouts
roleMapping.thor: API Backend Developer - REST/GraphQL APIs, push notifications, authentication, real-time sync
roleMapping.cap: Product Owner - User experience quality, app store strategy, feature scope, platform guidelines
roleMapping.thanos: QA Lead - Device testing matrix, performance profiling, security audit, crash monitoring
